2164115857237805084.Text: I can calm the corprus victims with soothing drum rhythms if you'll bring me their guarskin drum. It must be somewhere here in the Corprusarium.

1467992021035227056.Text: Be careful if you're going to prowl around down here. We will be VERY angry if you hurt any of our patients. And our patients can be quite a handful, I'll tell you. Strong as ogrim and twice as mean. But they seem to like it when I play the drum. Quiets them down. There's a drum around here someplace. They wander off with it sometimes. But find that drum and bring it to me, and I think I can calm them down for a while.

956511130165978222.Text: Be careful if you're going to prowl around down here. We will be VERY angry if you hurt any of our patients. And our patients can be quite a handful, I'll tell you. Strong as ogrim and twice as mean.
